forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
The morning shines gracefully upon Downtown San Francisco, a city just awakening to a day that promises warmth and clarity. With the sun spilling its amber light over the skyline, one can see the usual marine layer retreating into the distance, leaving the iconic Golden Gate Bridge revealed against a vast azure backdrop. The air feels crisp yet inviting, a slight breeze from the north northwest stirring the blossoms and the leaves, creating whispers of spring. As the day matures, expect a gentle drop in temperatures, wrapping the afternoon in a cozy embrace of 74 degrees, a fitting end for any exploration or leisure you may embark on.

As evening approaches, the sky will cloak itself in partial clouds, which may lend the twilight hours a certain charm, perfect for winding down or enjoying a quiet dinner al fresco. The humidity remains low—ideal for outdoor pursuits like perambulating through Golden Gate Park or savoring a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the distant hum of wavelets against the piers forms a serene cadence. Dress in layers; a light sweater or shawl will complement a short-sleeved top, allowing you the freedom to adapt to the shifts in the evening chill. With such pleasant conditions at hand, make the most of today. A visit to a local café or a bookstore, enveloped in the ambiance of good company and fragrant brews, seems equally alluring.
